## Initial setup

Publish the project to Quarto Pub interactively by typing

```sh
export QUARTO_PUB_AUTH_TOKEN=TOKEN_HERE
quarto publish
```

Save the generated `_publish.yml`. Once the `_publish.yml` is generated, the succeeding builds will be handled by GitHub actions.

## Wiki

This website contains resources related to the R [@RCoreTeam-2024] package [manCTMed](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed) outside the [pkgdown](https://jeksterslab.github.io/manCTMed) documentation.
